Room.Name: Mehetable's Apple Orchid
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a well tended apple orchid, owned by Mehetable the Witch.
Room.LongDescription: Mehetable refuses to let young men court her beautiful daughters, waiting for the three sons of Trantori to return from their adventures in the east. She owes Trantori a favor, and has promised him wives for his sons. The path leads back to Lelion Way, but under the bridge there.
